title: deki001
author: deki001
content: Hi,I offer ShitCoin Marketing Services since 2021.Â  Check the full list of services with prices and examples on my Telegram Channel:https://t.me/DekiMarketingÂ  Or, you can contact me directly on TG here:https://t.me/DekiDevRecent Clients:I worked with the following projects in the last 15-20 days (directly or through my re-sellers)- https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xa2caade2b5d21216836b81dd2d81bd3743ef79880- https://www.dextools.io/app/en/bnb/pair-explorer/0xda574013e8e67e822d0547d9cd9e8e1075827e3a- https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x1b117c931af91a298e8b91977500becc431281e70- https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xd032c6f4053e70f1631c8151f880fe194b5cf1730- https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0x8e2f14b163d5a9167c307d43096f33a9bf9ebaa20Work for them (services they ordered) is finished so I shared them. I also have 3-4 projects I am working on right now that I can not share.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Here comes another shitcoin marketer who is being carried away by his or her shitcoin valueless valued sales. I really do not think anybody here would want to associate with shitcoin now as scammers are now the figure head of shitcoin projects.Investing in shitcoin has never been in my own side because I lost alot to shitcoin which I was deceived into buying without to really doing my research as a newbie then. Many many shitcoin project sank my funds d yielded no results as I learnt my lesson never to think of putting a dime in the name of investing in shitcoin.OP, I think you should look for something else to present here because nobody would listen or give you attention here merely looking at your thread. Possibly working on a new thing to market here would make much sense than coming to tell about shitcoin.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: deki001 on December 06, 2023, 08:59:55 PMHi,I offer ShitCoin Marketing Services since 2021Work for them (services they ordered) is finished so I shared them. I also have 3-4 projects I am working on right now that I can not share.Of course, you cannot share that because people will dump those shitcoins that you are working on and will work onWith so many shitcoins coming up I'm sure you are running a good business, why don't you open another business that is exposing projects that are shitcoins, you already have a list, your clientsÂ  , that's two birds with one stone.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: You are offering shitcoin marketing service from 2021 but you are on this forum from Date Registered: Â Â Â August 21, 2023, 09:10:25 AM. Before that where you were working for the shitcoin marketing? Have you another account what is the username of that account?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: In the past developers will deny their coin was shitcoin and will be offended if their coin were called by such a name but now they are openly promoted, many investors know that its shitcoins but they promote and shills these kinds of coins because there are no new coins with good potential that they can invest and promote so they end up supporting shitcoin.This is the state of altcoins now, majority are now shitcoins and OP is making a living promoting shitcoins because there's no good coin to promote anymore

Of a truth there are no much good projects these days compared to the days of the inception of blockchain.What baffles me most is that most of these celebrities and big names are majorly of theÂ  influencers of behind the promotion of the shitcoin we see today. I would not be surprised OP is one of them pretending to just be a newbie here.

comments.author: Alpha Marine
comments.body: You are a marketer mate, you should know better than to call what you're marketing "shitcoin" How do you choose to use the word shitcoins for a project you market? Well, it's a good thing you're honest enough to call it what it is. Developers do not accept that their coins are shitcoin so when you put this kind of ad out, Hiring you prove a point that the coin is truly a shitcoin.Â  I just hope more people knew and understood that a good number of these shitcoin will continue to remain what they are; shit. I see a lot of marketing done by shitcoins on social media and I just feel sorry for the people that fall for it.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: This is now the state of altcoin, shitcoin take the spotlight because there's hardly a good coin to promote and the investors are promoters are hungry for more coins to invest in and promote, so there's no difference if you're promoting a good coin or a shitcoin as long as you satisfy the needs of the market.So we have trending coins, NFT, and meme coins that bring nothing to the community.But the community is getting used to it, they can make money from these shitcoins, and the altcoins era will not die because shitcoins are getting a lot of support,I pity new investors because they are the willing victims of these shitcoin and OP is partly to blame for this.

comments.author: deki001
comments.body: You guys are insane!Shitcoin has a broader meaning than just a project that is shit... Within the degens communities, shitcoins are all projects that are launched on DEXs pretty much...If you do not understand the "ShitCoin" space, you should not post comments like that.And yes, I target people who are in the shitcoin space, not you obviously, that's why you find this strange.There were multiple non-intelligent statements in this thread, but I would like to focus on 1 specific for now.I find it hilarious that one guy "called me out" for my registration date on this platform - LMAO.So, if I am not registered on this platform, I am not allowed to have a business running? - LMAO.Also, my marketing techniques can be applied to any project. Any project can get on trending on crypto websites, etc...Still, I appreciate honest and kind replies on this thread so much!If anyone wants to see my work or learn more, can contact me on Telegram - @DekiDev

comments.body: Quote from: Bushdark on December 07, 2023, 07:11:53 PM If promoting shitcoins is what he does for living I don't have any problem with that but the word "shitcoin" sounds irrational to many people here. yeap makes me wonder how that marketing could work by not even appreciating the own product. You don't sell a product showing its down sides.
